==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|じつ|k1=じっ|し|yomi=on}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じっし}}

# [[practice]], [[execution]], [[enforcement]], putting into effect

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|実行|じっこう}}, {{ja-r|遂行|すいこう}}

====Compounds====

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|じっし}}

# to put into practice, to carry out, to [[execute]] (''a plan etc.''), to [[put]] into [[effect]], to put into force (''a law etc.'')
#: {{ja-usex|その法律は来年１月から実施される。|その ほうりつ は らいねん いちがつ から じっし される。|The law will take effect next January.}}
